analytics.name: Overall
analytics.description: You can always see growth areas both individually by employees and across the entire company, allowing you to adjust plans, motivation, meetings, and sales targets.

education.name: Staff
education.description: The system provides personal feedback on specific sales based on company work standards, helping maintain high service quality regardless of employee experience.
